title: Service Disruption on North East Line due to Signalling Fault

updates.text: NEL Svc has resumed. Free bus rides have ceased. We are sorry.
NEL svc has resumed. Additional travel time up to 10 minutes may be expected as we are regulating the trains.
NEL Svc is delayed due to a signaling fault at Sengkang Station. Additional travel time of about 20 minutes may be expected. We are sorry.
NEL Svc is delayed due to a signaling fault at Sengkang Station. Additional travel time of about 15 minutes may be expected. We are sorry.
NEL Svc is delayed due to a Signalling fault at Sengkang station. Additional travel time about 10 minutes may be expected. We are sorry.
